mapper.insert: insert into t_yonghu (yonghuId, yonghuName, yonghuPassword, yonghuXingming, yonghuSex, yonghuAge, yonghuPhone, yonghuMark1, yonghuMark2, yonghuMark3, yonghuMark4, yonghuDate1, yonghuDate2, yonghuType1, yonghuType2, yonghuImg, yonghuImgName, yhroleId, yhroleName, yhbumenId, yhbumenName ) values (#{yonghuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yonghuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuXingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yonghuAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yonghuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuMark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuMark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yonghuDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yonghuType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yonghuType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yonghuImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yonghuImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhroleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yhroleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhbumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yhbumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_yonghu set yonghuName = #{yonghuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuPassword = #{yonghuPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuXingming = #{yonghuXingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuSex = #{yonghuSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yonghuAge = #{yonghuAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yonghuPhone = #{yonghuPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuMark1 = #{yonghuMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuMark2 = #{yonghuMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuMark3 = #{yonghuMark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuMark4 = #{yonghuMark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuDate1 = #{yonghuDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, yonghuDate2 = #{yonghuDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, yonghuType1 = #{yonghuType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yonghuType2 = #{yonghuType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yonghuImg = #{yonghuImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yonghuImgName = #{yonghuImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhroleId = #{yhroleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yhroleName = #{yhroleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yhbumenId = #{yhbumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yhbumenName = #{yhbumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where yonghuId = #{yonghuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select yonghuId, yonghuName, yonghuPassword, yonghuXingming, yonghuSex, yonghuAge, yonghuPhone, yonghuMark1, yonghuMark2, yonghuMark3, yonghuMark4, yonghuDate1, yonghuDate2, yonghuType1, yonghuType2, yonghuImg, yonghuImgName, yhroleId, yhroleName, yhbumenId, yhbumenName from t_yonghu where yonghuId = #{yonghuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
